details.en: ## Sleep Observation - Revolutionary Touch-to-Sleep App ### Specialized in improving sleep onset. Fall asleep just by touching and stroking your smartphone. #### ğŸ“Š Achievements - **Downloads**: Over **42,000** (as of October 2024) - **App Store**: **#1** in Medical category - **Google Play**: **#1** in Health & Fitness category - **Media Coverage**: ITMedia News, ASCII, Tarzan, FNN Prime Online, and many more --- ### What is Sleep Observation? While there are many apps for sleep induction in the mental health field, 'Sleep Observation' proposes a solution to the problem of '**suffering from not being able to fall asleep after getting into bed**' with a unique method not found elsewhere. #### ğŸŒ™ Revolutionary Approach That method is '**falling asleep while touching your smartphone**'. Conventional wisdom says: - Looking at smartphone light awakens the brain - Don't bring smartphones to bed - Put away phones when sleeping But we thought: > The time spent touching smartphones is when we can be ourselves without worrying about anyone. Why do we have to let go of our smartphones when sleeping, when they provide us with healing time? --- ### Development Background The developer focused on the fact that there hasn't been much development for **using smartphones with eyes closed**, and thought that if there were content that could be enjoyed with eyes closed, it could create an app that helps with sleep induction. Initially created for the developer's own insomnia, it has now grown into an app that **makes going to bed something to look forward to**. --- ### Key Features #### ğŸ¯ Touch-to-Sleep Content - **Stroke & Tap**: Get soothing responses by gently stroking or tapping the screen - **Eyes-Closed Enjoyment**: Tactile and auditory content that doesn't rely on vision - **Rich Variety**: Various situational content available #### ğŸ¨ Special Content - **Cat Petting Content**: Healing content with child's breathing sounds - **Vibration-Only Content**: For environments where sound isn't possible - **AI-Generated Autumn Retreat**: 8 different scenes (gentle breeze, rain, dawn, dusk, morning, noon, evening, night) --- ### Media Coverage & Recognition #### ğŸ“º Major Media Appearances - Employee performance improvement through better sleep - Stress reduction and mental health support - Exhibited at Tokyo Big Sight "Gendered Innovation EXPO" Official site: https://suiminkansokuforteams.lovable.app/ --- ### Growth Timeline #### ğŸ“ˆ Download Progression - **July 2022**: 3,500 downloads after 1 year (no promotion) - **August 2022**: 8,000 downloads in 4 days after official release - **August 2022**: 10,000 downloads in 2 weeks - **October 2024**: 40,000+ downloads (zero advertising, word-of-mouth only) --- ### Future Development - **June 2025**: Presentation at Japan Sleep Society Conference - **Enhanced AI Integration**: Personalized sleep induction content - **Global Expansion**: Multi-language support for international markets Sleep Observation is more than just an app - it's creating a **new sleep culture**.

details.en: ## The Appeal of Gizin's Games We propose innovative gameplay that no one has ever seen before, with new ideas that transcend existing platforms and genre boundaries. --- ## Game Content Production Achievements ### Mobile Wars #### Overview **Released in July 2007** (*1). The world's first game to provide the revolutionary "**card synthesis & card gacha**" model that transformed mobile gaming history. #### Innovative Game System - **Card Collection System**: Players collect cards through battles and gacha - **Card Synthesis Feature**: Combine multiple cards to create more powerful rare cards - **Gacha Mechanism**: Pioneer of randomized monetization systems - **Social Elements**: PvP battles and cooperative gameplay #### Social Impact This game model was later adopted by many companies and became a **social phenomenon that changed the law** (*2). - **Industry Influence**: Numerous game companies worldwide adopted this model - **Market Expansion**: Contributed to rapid growth of the mobile gaming market - **Regulatory Development**: Led to regulations for healthy industry development #### Results - **Service Members**: Over **700,000** registered users - **Revenue Model**: Successful F2P (Free-to-Play) + item purchase model - **Operation Period**: Achieved long-term stable operation - **Industry Recognition**: Influenced many game developers #### Technical Features - **Server Technology**: Infrastructure supporting large-scale concurrent connections - **Database Design**: Efficient management of vast card data and user information - **Security**: Anti-cheat measures and fair play environment maintenance - **Updates**: Regular new card additions and event hosting --- ### About the Revival Version In 2021, Gizin Inc. released a **revival version**, maintaining the original's appeal while optimizing for modern smartphones. #### Revival Version Features - **Improved Graphics**: High-resolution display support - **UI/UX Enhancement**: Usability aligned with modern standards - **Balance Adjustments**: Game balance refined through years of operational experience - **New Elements**: Features to engage new players --- ### Notes *1 The original distributor in 2007 was K sound design Inc. *2 On July 1, 2012, new operational standards targeting 'card matching' activities were enforced. This led to 'complete gacha' being considered by the Consumer Affairs Agency as a lottery equivalent to 'card matching,' potentially violating the Act against Unjustifiable Premiums and Misleading Representations. * The screenshots are from the revival version distributed by Gizin Inc. in 2021.
